name: Catch the Shapes!
description:
Collaborated with Keiry Gao (Game Programming Period 1)

His itch.io link : https://itch.io/profile/keirykiri

Catch the falling objects while relaxing and chilling to lofi hip hop chill beats

Move the basket using arrow keys(only left and right movement)

Credits

Tutorial: http://xrayisgray.de/sites/tutorial_1.html
